messages.message:
cc @Subash @Weiming Wu looks like a decent number of tests are now failing after the homepage re-design:
https://instabase.slack.com/archives/C029ZG026GZ/p1719931741811899
Was it just GA'ed? Can we change it back to opt out, and change it back to GA after these are fixed?
Yep it was GA'd overnight for us US folks - I made the PR and Subash helped me merge it
We can add mocks to the feature flags endpoint to make it act like not GA'ed for now while we work on a fix
Or, if we think the tests are no longer relevant, we can skip them
They're definitely still relevant, I think the issues are that they're using the home page to navigate
We should mock the flags for now. I can start working on fixing the tests today since I'm otherwise blocked on home page refresh work for a bit
I have a `stubIARedesignFeatureFlag` util that we can make more generic for this
jw, does the PR to turn it to GA pass these Cypress tests?
I'm assuming it didn't trigger any cypress tests and that's why it got through?
i see. Maybe it's worth to add the file to the cypress dependency script
i'm going to add stub for the tests mentioned above
@CJ is working on improvements to the dependency script but I know weâ€™ve had trouble in the past making it very accurate
PR to stub feature flag requests: https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/59471
Looks like there are some issues with the review dashboard tests being flaky. Let's force merge this PR so other PRs can be unblocked @Xindi Xu

Merged in the PR to fix the failing tests due to home page refresh. If you have these tests failing on your PR, please rebase:
```view-home-page
send-product-feedback
aihub-templates
build-project-crud
billing
converse-app
converse-project-crud```
